description: This file defines a User Management API service with functions for CRUD operations, account requests, role management, and user search, including related data interfaces and constants.

methods.name: getUsers
methods.description: Fetches all users with optional filtering by status and role.

methods.name: approveAccount
methods.description: Approves a user account request and assigns a role.

methods.name: rejectAccount
methods.description: Rejects a user account request with a reason.

methods.name: revokeUser
methods.description: Revokes a user account with a reason.
